posts.post_content: Use [Kaervek's Torch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaervek's Torch) as a cheaper alternative to [Banefire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Banefire), since it can't be [Force of Will](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Force of Will)ed so early in the game either. However, most players will frown upon any turn 1 kill combos, so don't be surprised if that turn 1 kill is the last turn you get to play that day.
posts.html:
Use Kaervek's Torch as a cheaper alternative to Banefire, since it can't be Force of Willed so early in the game either. However, most players will frown upon any turn 1 kill combos, so don't be surprised if that turn 1 kill is the last turn you get to play that day.

posts.post_content:
If you're using mox's, I'd say Lotus, Ruby, Emerald, Play a Plains  
  
Lotus for 3 green  
2 Green on channel  
1 green, 1 white, 13 life on Dawnglow infusion (7 life remaining means they can't double bolt you)  
--the above gains you a net 13 life  
spend 26 life on banefire
posts.html:
